#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
	return (b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b));
}

ll fun(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==1)
	return 1;
	ll d=gcd(a,b);
	if (d==1)
	return 0;
	else fun(a,b/d);
}

int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll a,b,i;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
		i=fun(a,b/(gcd(a,b)));
		if(i==0)
		printf("No\n");
		if(i==1)
		printf("Yes\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
